All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddDefaultSensor
    This class has the responsibility to manage the information displayed and the interactions made with the view when adding a Sensor.
    AddMeanSensor
    This class has the responsibility to manage the information displayed and the interactions made with the view when adding a MeanSensor.
    AddSensorView
    This class has the responsibility to manage the information displayed and the interactions made with the view when adding any type of sensor.
    AlertBox
    This class is here to make the use of Alert easier by having some pre usable methods to display alert boxes
    AlgoBoundedRandom
    This algorithm is used to generate random temperatures between the minimum and maximum temperature set.
    AlgoRandom
    This algorithm is used to generate random temperatures
    AlgoSmallFluctuation
    This algorithm is used to generate random temperatures with a coefficient to reduce the difference between the previous and the new temperature
    AlgoSmallFluctuationView
    This class has the responsibility to manage the information displayed and the interactions made with the view displayed when a Sensor is using or means to use an AlgoSmallFluctuation class.
    CamView
    This class has the responsibility to manage the information displayed and the interactions made with the view displaying an image of the temperature.
    ComponentSensor
    Abstract type that can represent different types of sensors in the composite pattern.
    ComponentSensorInitializer
    class inheriting of the persistence meant to initialize the censors to certain values.
    ComponentSensorManager
    This class is made to make a link between the persistence and the ComponentSensors displayed in the view.
    ComponentSensorProxy
    This class creates a proxy of ComponentSensor to allow the save of this class
    CompositeSensor
    This class inherits of the ComponentSensor and is in charge of being composed of ComponentSensors in the composite pattern.
    CompositeSensorProxy
    This class creates a proxy of CompositeSensor to allow of this class to be saved
    ControllerUtility  
    DigitalView
    This class has the responsibility to manage the information displayed and the interactions made with the view displaying the temperature digitally.
    IdComparator
    This class is meant to give a comparator to a TreeMap in order to class them by id value.
    Main  
    MainView  
    MeanSensor
    This class inheriting of the CompositeSensor observes several ComponentSensors in order to make a mean value of all their temperatures, with a coefficient for every sensor.
    MeanSensorProxy
    This class creates a proxy of MeanSensor to allow the save of this class
    MeanSensorTest  
    ModifyChildrenMeanSensor
    This class has the responsibility to manage the information displayed and the interactions made with the view displayed for a MeanSensor in order to modify its children.
    Persistence<T>
    This interface describes the methods implemented by classes that will save the data
    ProxyCreator
    This interface describes the methods implemented by ProxyCreator sub-classes.
    ResizableImageView
    This class is responsible of resizing automatically an image inside it.
    RootSensor
    This class inherits of CompositeSensor.
    Sensor
    Sensor extends ComponentSensor, it is a leaf of the composite pattern.
    SensorAlgoChanger
    This class factorises the behaviour of algorithms created WARNING : Don't forget to call notifyFatherIExist() in a static block to display this algorithm in the mainView comboBox if your class inherit of this class
    SensorInitializer
    Stub of sensors (used for the tests)
    SensorManagerTest  
    SensorPersistance<ComponentSensor>
    This class was originally made for the persistance of the Sensors.
    SensorPersistanceTest  
    SensorProxy
    This class creates a proxy of Sensor to allow the save of this class
    SensorTest  
    Weather
    Weather is a class made for representing one type of weather that corresponds to a range of temperatures.
    WeatherInitializer
    A stub for the data corresponding to different weathers.
    WeatherManager
    WeatherManage contains a list of all the possible weathers.
